metadata.name: PerlinWay Player #????
metadata.description: PerlinWay Players are a collection of 9,000 game-ready, 3D avatars native to Ethereum. Your PerlinWay Player grants you membership to PerlinDAO + access to #MetaSpace: an enchanting open-world where members can explore, battle, rave and earn '$PWS' (PerlinWay Shards). Visit https://perlinway.com to learn more.
